Package org.neo4j.io.fs

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChecksumWriter  
    EphemeralPositionable  
    FileHandle
    A handle to a file as seen by the page cache.
    FileSystemAbstraction  
    FileUtils.Operation  
    FlushableChannel
    Provides flush semantics over a WritableChannel.
    FlushableChecksumChannel
    Extends a WritableChannel and FlushableChannel with a way of calculating checksum.
    PositionableChannel  
    ReadableChannel
    Represents a channel from where primitive values can be read.
    ReadableChecksumChannel
    Extends the ReadableChannel with a way to validate checksum over parts.
    StoreChannel  
    WritableChannel
    Represents an infinite channel to write primitive data to.
    WritableChecksumChannel
    Represents an infinite channel to write primitive data to that can have a checksum calculated over.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultFileSystemAbstraction
    Default file system abstraction that creates files using the underlying file system.
    DelegatingFileSystemAbstraction  
    DelegatingStoreChannel<T extends StoreChannel>  
    EphemeralDynamicByteBuffer
    Dynamically expanding ByteBuffer substitute/wrapper.
    EphemeralFileChannel  
    EphemeralFileData  
    EphemeralFileLock  
    EphemeralFileSystemAbstraction  
    EphemeralLocalPosition  
    FileSystemLifecycleAdapter
    Life cycle adapter that will perform file system abstraction shutdown on life shutdown.
    FileSystemUtils
    This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on files, directories, or other types of files.
    FileUtils
    Set of utility methods to work with Path using the default file system.
    FileUtils.CopyingFileVisitor  
    FileUtils.DeletingFileVisitor  
    FileVisitors  
    FileVisitors.Decorator<T>  
    IoPrimitiveUtils  
    PhysicalFlushableChannel
    The main implementation of FlushableChannel.
    PhysicalFlushableChecksumChannel
    The main implementation of FlushableChannel.
    ReadAheadChannel<T extends StoreChannel>
    A buffering implementation of ReadableChannel.
    SelectiveFileSystemAbstraction
    Allows you to select different file system behaviour for one file and a different file system behaviour for everyone else e.g.
    SelectiveFileWatcher
    File watcher that will perform watching activities using specific file watcher in case if requested resource will match to provided SelectiveFileWatcher.specialPath.
    StoreFileChannel  
    StreamFilesRecursive  
    UncloseableDelegatingFileSystemAbstraction
    File system abstraction that wraps real file system and prevent it from being closed.
    WrappingFileHandle  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ChecksumMismatchException  
    EphemeralFileStillOpenException  
    ReadPastEndException
    Thrown when reading from a ReadableByteChannel into a buffer and not enough bytes (Buffer.limit()) could be read.
